opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer
Class Disjunctivizer

java.lang.Object
  opennlp.ccg.disjunctivizer.Disjunctivizer

public class Disjunctivizer
extends Object

Creates a disjunctive logical form from a difference between two graphs. Instances can be configured to switch handling of LFGraphDifference.inserts(), LFGraphDifference.deletes() and LFGraphDifference.substitutions() on or off. By default, all three are performed.

Disjunctivizers can be re-used, so that all of the boolean parameters setProcessingDeletes(boolean), setProcessingInserts(boolean), and setProcessingSubstitutions(boolean) can be modified in between calls to buildDisjunctiveLFFor(LFGraphDifference). When these parameters are changed, the disjunctive LF built will change as well. The Document used to create disjunctive LF elements (and the elements within them) can be configured as well, either at creation or via setDocument(Document).

Author:
Scott Martin

Disjunctivizer(Document, boolean, boolean, boolean)

Disjunctivizer

public Disjunctivizer(Document document,
                      boolean processingInserts,
                      boolean processingDeletes,
                      boolean processingSubstitutions)
Creates a new disjunctivizer that will use the specified document to create the elements in its generated disjunctive LFs, with the specified parameters dictating whether to process inserts, deletes, and substitutions.

Parameters:
document - The document to use for creating elements, attributes, nodes, etc.
processingInserts - Whether to process LFGraphDifference.inserts().
processingDeletes - Whether to process LFGraphDifference.deletes().
processingSubstitutions - Whether to process LFGraphDifference.substitutions().

buildDisjunctiveLFFor

public Element buildDisjunctiveLFFor(LFGraphDifference graphDifference)
Builds a disjunctive LF based on the specified graph difference. The shape of the returned element will change depending on whether inserts, deletes, or substitutions are being processed.

Parameters:
graphDifference - The graph difference to use for building the disjunctive LF.
Returns:
A recursively build disjunctive LF based on this disjunctivizer's graph difference.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If graphDifference is null.
